summary: openscap bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The OpenSCAP suite enables integration of the Security Content Automation
Protocol (SCAP) line of standards. The openscap packages provide the
OpenSCAP library and the oscap utility that provides various SCAP
capabilities.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* Enable YAML probe to work with sets of values (BZ#1895715)

* Can't build profile with specific platform set (BZ#1896676)
